text: John McDowall (born 1902, date of death unknown) was a British swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre backstroke event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1902 births Category:Year of death missing Category:British male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Great Britain Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing Category:Male backstroke swimmers
title: John McDowall
